name: Mars Lander (itch) (Fox)
description:
A re-creation of the 1979 Atari classic Lunar Lander with new game play.

This is a LOVE2D community project with contributions from

  • togfox

  • McSnappen

  • Gunroar:cannon()

  • Philbywhizz

  • MadByte

Player instructions

Fly your Mars Lander across the surface of Mars. Land at fuel bases. Earn money. Fly as far as you can and challenge your friends!

Features:

- 2D platformer. Fly as far as you can before running out of fuel

- play with your friends on LAN

- land carefully and get fuel

- buy upgrades with money

- sweet pixel art with animations

- parallax scrolling

- simple to play. Just five buttons.

Future features

- android and touch screen compatible

- internet play with  your friends

- more sounds and more modules to buy

- more animations

- more everything!

This is a community project developed by those who love making games. This project will evolve over time so come back soon and see what's changed!
